model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The class User which has methods to buy stock, create portfolio, evaluate portfolio, calculate cost basis and view composition of the portfolio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User()
      Instantiates a new User and the portfolios hash map.
